caption: The video tells the story of people on Earth who finally regain hope and sacrifice their lives at the last minute. The younger sister in the plot, through his sincerity and true feelings, moved the people who took refuge in the underground and sat waiting for death. In the rescue team is about to fail, the critical moment, the remaining people have to regain hope to save the earth. The middle-aged man in the computer room full of power cables, at the cost of his own life to restore the system, and finally the system recovered. Brother's team, driving the vehicle to escape the collapse of the furnace core. But they realized that, despite their efforts, the flames from the engine would not be able to ignite the entire channel of flammable gas and save the planet.
